QuestData.Title: Righteous Retribution
QuestData.Description:
Cyrus taught me how to deal with thugs, bullies, and scum like pirates.
When they hit us, we hit back twice as hard.
<Taelia's hand finds the haft of her hammer and grips it tight.>
It's time to hit back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Taelia destroy the pirate ships in Daelin's Gate.
QuestData.RewardText: Those cowards only understand strength. Show them you're not an easy victim and they turn tail and run.
